FuncDef: The display alarm information command displays alarm information. The display alarm information command displays alarm information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an alarm. This alarm must exist.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters. If no alarm name is specified, information about all alarms in the system will be displayed.

ExtraInfo: To obtain information about alarms in the system, run the display alarm information command.
